<title level="1" right="Rules">[Basic Magic Armor](/Rules.aspx?ID=3171)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 229 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The most common special armors are suits of armor with some combination of _[armor potency](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2785)_ and _[resilient runes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2786)_. The [magic armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2804) stat block provides a quick reference for these types of armor.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
